language_change_notice: Language also applies to the classic Tk interface and will be remembered.
panel_clustering_threshold_note: Typical Seestar S50: 0.05–0.12° same session; up to 0.20° multi-night. Larger values may merge adjacent panels.
panel_orientation_split_note: Uses WCS field angle; edges require |Δangle| ≤ threshold.
mt_crop_and_reject_frame_title: Master Tile Cropping and Rejection Options

msg_processing_completed_errors: Processing completed with errors. Please check logs.
q_open_output_folder_msg: Do you want to open the output folder '{folder}'?
q_quit_while_processing_msg:
Processing is currently in progress.
Quitting now might interrupt the process abruptly.

Are you sure you want to quit?
worker_module_missing_critical_error:
Worker module (zemosaic_worker.py) not found or import error.
ZeMosaic cannot start its main functionalities.

Please check console logs for import error details and ensure all dependencies (Astropy, Reproject, etc.) are installed.

assemble_info_intertile_photometric_appl: Phase 5: Applied inter-tile photometric calibration to {num_tiles} tile(s).
run_warn_phase4_failed_set_pixel_shape: WARN P4: Failed to set pixel shape for a Master Tile; using defaults.
run_warn_phase4_invalid_master_tile_for_: WARN P4: Invalid Master Tile WCS/shape for grid; skipped.
run_warn_phase4_no_data_in_tile_fits: WARN P4: No data found in Master Tile FITS; skipped.
run_warn_phase4_unhandled_tile_shape: WARN P4: Unhandled Master Tile shape; skipped.
run_warn_phase4_zero_dimensions_tile: WARN P4: Master Tile has zero dimensions; skipped.
panel_clustering_target_note: 0 disables. Increase threshold to reach ~target groups.
run_warn_phase3_master_tile_creation_fai: WARN P3: Master Tile creation failed in a worker thread.
run_warn_phase3_alignment_retry_abandone: WARN P3: Alignment retry abandoned for tile {tile_id} frame {filename} after {attempts} attempt(s).
run_info_phase3_retry_submitted: INFO P3: Retry stack scheduled from tile {origin_tile} -> new tile {new_tile} with {frames} frame(s).
run_warn_phase6_wcs_to_header_failed: WARN P6: Failed to convert WCS to FITS header: {error}
run_error_phase3_thread_exception: ERROR P3: Exception in master tile creation thread.
run_error_phase4_reading_tile_shape: ERROR P4: Failed reading Master Tile shape.
run_error_preview_stretch_unexpected_mai: ERROR: Unexpected error during preview stretch: {error}
filter.wcs.cluster_threshold.label: Cluster threshold (deg)
filter.wcs.max_raw_per_tile.label: Max raw frames per master tile
filter.instrument.label: Instrument:
filter.exclude.no_center: Cannot exclude by distance because no celestial center is available.
filter.activity.placeholder: Recent filter activity will be listed here.
filter_astap_multi_warning_message: Running more than one ASTAP instance can trigger the "Access violation" popup you saw earlier. Only continue if you are ready to dismiss those warnings and understand this mode is not officially supported.
filter.export.empty: No rows available for CSV export.
filter.cluster.no_groups: No master-tile groups could be prepared.
filter.cluster.helpers_missing: Auto-organisation helpers are unavailable; install the worker module.
filter.cluster.no_selection: Select at least one frame before requesting auto-organisation.
filter.cluster.sds_preview_summary: SDS preview: thr={threshold:.2f}, min={min_size}, target={target_size} -> {count} batch(es) {sizes}.
log_covfirst_start: Coverage-first clustering: start (threshold={TH} deg, cap={CAP}, min_cap={MIN})
log_covfirst_relax: Relaxed epsilon using P90 NN: old={OLD} deg -> new={NEW} deg
log_covfirst_autosplit: Autosplit applied: cap={CAP}, min_cap={MIN}, groups_in={IN}, groups_out={OUT}
log_covfirst_merge: Merged small groups with over-cap allowance={ALLOW}%, final_groups={N}
log_covfirst_done: Coverage-first preplan ready: {N} groups written to overrides_state.preplan_master_groups
filter_preview_points_hint: Preview uses group centers and outlines for performance. Zoom or filter to inspect coverage.
filter_log_no_missing_wcs: All listed files already include a WCS solution.
filter_warn_astap_missing: ASTAP executable not configured; skipping resolution.
filter_warn_worker_missing: Auto-grouping disabled because the processing worker module failed to load: {error}
filter_invalid_value_msg: Please enter a distance in degrees (numeric).
photometric_safe_fallback_applied: Photometric safeguard applied (corr={corr:.3f}, gain={gain:.3f}, offset={offset:.3f}, samples={samples})
FILTER_EXCLUDED_DIR: The folder "unaligned_by_zemosaic" is excluded and will not be scanned.
FILTER_MOVE_FAILED_INPUT: Input path points to an excluded folder. Please select another folder.
FILTER_WCS_FAIL_MOVED: WCS solve failed; file moved to 'unaligned_by_zemosaic'.
FILTER_REFRESH_AFTER_MOVE: List refreshed after excluding unaligned files.
qt_ansvr_hint:
ANSVR uses the local Ansvr service (Astrometry.net server).
Ensure it is installed and running on your system.
qt_tab_placeholder_solver: Solver configuration panes will be moved here in the next step of the refactor.
qt_tab_placeholder_system: System diagnostics and logging controls will live here once migrated.
qt_tab_placeholder_advanced: Advanced and expert-only toggles will be relocated to this tab.
qt_tab_placeholder_skin: Theme selection and appearance controls will arrive here soon.
qt_error_filter_launch: The filter interface could not be opened.
qt_error_filter_unavailable: Qt filter interface is not available.
qt_error_invalid_input_dir: Please select a valid input folder before filtering.
qt_error_missing_paths: Input and output folders must be configured before starting.
qt_error_no_fits: No FITS files found in the selected input folder.
qt_error_worker_missing_message: The processing backend is not available. Ensure zemosaic_worker is installed.
qt_field_altaz_nanize_threshold_tooltip: Pixels where the ALT-AZ mask opacity is <= this threshold are treated as invalid (NaN/0). Increase to remove more border ramps.
qt_field_astap_drizzled_fallback: Stacked/drizzled datasets: retry with auto FOV on failure

qt_field_cleanup_temp_artifacts: Delete temporary processing files after run
qt_field_max_raw_per_tile: Max raw frames per master tile (0 = unlimited)
qt_filter_prompt_message: Do you want to open the filter window to adjust the range and clustering before processing?
qt_log_config_fallback: Using in-memory defaults because zemosaic_config.load_config is unavailable.
qt_log_config_invalid_type: Configuration file contained unexpected data. Using defaults.
qt_log_config_missing: No configuration file found at {path}; defaults will be used until saved.
qt_log_placeholder: Worker output will appear here once the integration is complete.
qt_solver_none_hint: No plate solving will be performed. Existing WCS headers must be present.
qt_warning_already_running_message: A processing run is already active.
backend_change_notice: Backend change will take effect next time you launch ZeMosaic.
gpu_info_summary: GPU detected: {name} — total {total_mb} MB, free {free_mb} MB.
phase5_using_gpu: Phase 5 reprojection will use the GPU.
gpu_fallback_unavailable: GPU helper requested but unavailable ({reason}). Falling back to CPU.
gpu_fallback_insufficient_memory: GPU helper skipped: estimated {estimated_mb} MB vs allowed {allowed_mb} MB.
gpu_fallback_runtime_error: GPU helper error: {error}. Falling back to CPU.
gpu_helper_stream_tiles: GPU helper will stream tiles sequentially due to limited memory.
gpu_chunking_rows: GPU helper processing rows in batches of {rows}/{height}.
stack_gpu_fallback_unavailable: GPU stacking ({helper}) requested but unavailable ({reason}). Falling back to CPU.
stack_gpu_fallback_insufficient_memory: GPU stacking ({helper}) skipped: estimated {estimated_mb} MB vs allowed {allowed_mb} MB.
stack_gpu_fallback_runtime_error: GPU stacking error for {helper}: {error}. Falling back to CPU.
stack_gpu_chunking_rows: GPU stacking ({helper}) processing in {rows}/{height} row chunks.
